# ATX Level 1 Header

This paragraph demonstrates **strong emphasis**, *emphasis*, and `inline code`.
Markdown supports various inline styles for text decoration.

---

## ATX Level 2 Header

The horizontal rule above separates sections. Below is a Setext-style header.

Level 1 Setext Header
=====================

Level 2 Setext Header
---------------------

***

### ATX Level 3 Header

You can also use ~~strikethrough~~ or [hyperlinks](https://rust-lang.org) within paragraphs.
Multiple hashes determine the header depth in ATX style.
